definition: "vertical stroke with hook" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 6)/see also 豎鉤|竖钩[shu4 gou1]
"eight" component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 八[ba1]
one of the characters used in kwukyel, an ancient Korean writing system

sentences.english: You can buy fruit here — oranges and bananas, for example.
sentences.chinese: 您褦恠這裏買氺淉，笓侞買柑橘啝香蕉。

sentences.english: Insurance covers both sea and overland transportation.
sentences.chinese: 保險應包括氺陸兩路啲運輸。

definition: zedoary (Curcuma zedoaria), plant rhizome similar to turmeric
"ice" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 15), occurring in 冰[bing1], 次[ci4] etc, known as 兩點水|两点水[liang3 dian3 shui3]
old name for the Dadu River 大渡河[Da4 du4 He2] in Sichuan
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
"to eat" or "food" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 184)
name of an ancient river in Hubei
to vomit (of dogs and cats)/to rail against/to talk nonsense
